events.data: Hello there i am looking to go on a vacation with my family to Gotham City, can you help me?
when  would you like to travel and how many people will you be?
Not sure when we want to leave, but we are 12 kids and 5 adults
do you have a budget?
yes i do, it is around $2200
where will you be travelling from?
We are from Neverland
We have nothing available leaving from Neverland, are you able to depart from another city?
we can depart from Toronto
Gotham City is not a destination we travel to. Are you interested in any other destinations?
hmm what options would i have out of Toronto?
Would you be interested in Calgary?
that would be nice
I have a departure from Toronto to Calgary  on August 17 returning on August 24. Does that work for you?

No sorry i was planning on getting a tan this vacation. Thanks, is there anywhere else? Thank you
is there anywhere else?
How about a trip to Dominican Republic? it is quite cheap at this time of year.
What options do you have available for me?
I have the el Mar hotel available in Punta Cana this week.
That sounds interesting. how many stars does the hotel have?
2.5 stars. You would have to fly out of Melbourne though
Ahh...maybe another time
Hi I'd like to go to Caprica from Busan, between Sunday August 21, 2016 and Wednesday August 31, 2016
And what would be your maximum budget for this trip?
Actually it's unlimited for this trip
How many adults and how many children will be making this trip?
2 adults

I have no trips to Caprica from Busan.  I do have a trip to Mannheim, Germany, one to Kingston , Canada, and another to Toronto Canada.  Would you like to select alternate dates or an alternate travel destination?
Do you have anything for San Antonio as a destination?

Yes, I do.  I have one for 8445.37 USD.  Would you like to book this package?  The guest rating is 7.15/10 and there is free parking and free wifi.  Leaving Sunday, August 21st at 11:00 a.m. and returning Sunday, August 28th at 1:00 a.m.
Is breakfast included?
Yes, it is.
That sounds great. 1:00 am return on Sunday August 28th is very early in the morning...
Would you like to book this package?
Yes I would. Thanks for your help.
I'm looking for a trip to Gotham City leaving from Kakariko Village on Saturday, August 13, 2016. 3 adults for no more than $2400 USD.
I have a trip available to Vancouver for these dates within your price range.  Would you like to increase your budget or adjust the dates?
I'd like to adjust the departure city to Caprica.
Still no availability for this destination.  Would you like to increase your budget or adjust the dates?
The dates cannot be changed. How about going to Theed with 14 adults, leaving from Kakariko Village, on a budget of $2900?
Still no availability.
Then I will bring my business elsewhere. Thank you.
Good day, please book me a trip from Vancouver, Jamaica to Recife. I would like to leave for 17 days on August 24.
Would you like to travel to Vancouver, Canada from Dublin, USA?
No, I would like to depart from Vancouver, Jamaica for the aforementioned destination.
I can book you an 8 day trip from Calgary to Vancouver, Canada for 810.50USD.
I would not like to travel to Vancouver, Canada.  Do you have any trips to Recife, Brazil?
I can book you a trip from Porto Alegre to Recife for 682.19USD.
I will take any package you give me to any destination as long as it leaves from Vancouver, Jamaica.
I can book you a trip from Vancouver, Canada to Toronto, Canada for 837.99USD.
If you cannot book me a flight that leaves from Vancouver, Jamaica then I cannot book a trip.
I cannot book you a trip leaving from Vancouver, Jamaica.
Actually I will be departing from Vancouver, British Columbia, do you have packages to Recife?
I can book 11 days in Recife leaving from Vancouver for 2171.6USD.
Do you have any similar packages to Goiania?
I can book 5 days in Goiania for 2190.68USD.
What kind of hotel would I be staying at in Recife?
3.5 star hotel for free wi-fi, free parking, and free breakfast.
Would my room have a view of the city? How much would it cost to upgrade to a room with a view?
I cannot provide this information
Ok, I'm ready to buy this package

Ok. I will book this package for you. You will be leaving Vancouver, Canada at 1:00 pm - Monday, August 15th 2016 and arriving in Recife, Brazil at 10:16 pm - Monday, August 15th 2016. You will be staying at La Casa Del Amor. Enjoy your trip.
I was supposed to leave on August 24th. Do you have any packages that leave on that date?
I can book you 11 days in Recife leaving Vancouver on August 27th for 3119.42USD.
Actually I would like to purchase the first package to Recife.
Ok, I will book you the package to Recife that leaves Vancouver, Canada on August 15.
Thanks
Hey man, imma leave from Godric's Hollow on August 27, 2016 and go to Goiania. Can't pay more than 4300USD. Watcha got?
Hello, how many people will be travelling to Goiania?
Just me
I cannot find any trips to Goiania leaving from Godric's Hollow. Is there another nearby city you could depart from?
yeah how about Montreal?
I can book you 11 days in Goiania for 3374.42USD. Are you interested?
that's leaving on August 27th?
You will leave Montreal on Tuesday, August 16th 2016.
nothing closer to the 27th?
I can book 11 days at the same hotel for 3549.83USD leaving on August 25.
ya that's awesome. I'll book it. thanks man.
Ok, I will book that trip. Enjoy.
Hi. I'm looking for an adventure from Thursday, August 18 to Saturday, September 3. I'm thinking of going to Fortaleza. Yes, with free breakfast of course. I'm leaving from Essen.

I can book 8 days in Fortaleza for 2026.51USD, 9 days in Ciudad Juarez for 3393.97USD, 9 days in Burlington for 2119.26USD, or 9 days in Buenos Aires for 2085.15USD. All of these options have free breakfast.
Can you tell me more about the Fortaleza package?
I can book 8 days in Fortaleza for 2026.51USD.
How many stars is the hotel?
The hotel in Fortaleza is 3.0 stars with a user rating of 7.15 stars.
Is there free wifi?
There is free wifi and free parking in addition to free breakfast.
I like the Fortaleza package. How about the Ciudad Juarez and Burlington packages, is there free wifi and parking in addition to breakfast?
The hotel in Ciudad Juarez has free parking and wifi, but the hotel in Burlington does not offer free parking. It does, however, have free wifi.
I'll book the Fortaleza package please.
You will leave Essen at 10:00 am - Wednesday, August 17th 2016. Thank you for using this service.
Perfect. Thank you for your help
Hi looking to go on vacation on the 13th of august
Our best deal right now is to Vancouver, Canada.
How about Naples
and which city will you be departing from?
Vancouver
Perfect, any idea how long you would like to spend in Naples and when you would like to depart?
im planning on a three day get away from the 13th to the 16th of August
I have an availability on August 19th and it is for a 6 day stay. Are you okay with that?
ya that sounds interesting can you tell me more about this package?

You would be staying at the Courtyard Resort which is a 3-star hotel, breakfast and wifi included. The flight is a direct flight from Vancouver to Naples on economy class. The total cost is $2349.83USD.
are there any other Hotels?
There is also the Tower Hotel which is a 4-star hotel, but that one is only available from August 24th to August 28th.
How much would that be?
and is that flight in Business class?
No it would be in economy class
can we upgrade it?
Absolutely.  The new price  would work out to $2568.35USD. Would you like me to book that for you?
yes please that sounds perfect! Thank You!
Hello, I want to leave from Seoul on August 27 and return on September 9. You can go to Manaus.
Do you have a maximum budget for this travel package?
No budget, I show me an array of packages with varying prices

Only one travel package for Mainaus is available for a departure on August 27th at 8:00 a.m.  The hotel is very good, with a 6.77/10 guest rating.  However, the return date is August 31st at 1:00 a.m. for this travel package.  I have no other locations available for these departure and arrival dates.  Would you like to book this travel package?
Would I be staying in a room with an ocean front view? How much would it cost to upgrade to such a room?
I'm sorry, I do not have that information
Does the hotel have a gym which guests can access?
Yes there is a gym.  Would you like to book this travel package?
Please. Thanks
Hello, I have 15 vacation days available between June 1st and August 31st. I am leaving from Theed. I would like to go somewhere with lots of sunshine.
I have no departures available from Theed.  Would you like to pick another departure travel location?
Do you have any departures from Kobe, Japan?
No, I don't.  Would you like to select another location?
How about Birmingham City?
Sure.  Would you like to go to Mexico City?  I have a flight available on Wednesday, August 17th at 10:00 a.m. to Tuesday, August 23rd at 4:00 a.m.
What are my options for hotels?

The best hotel I have is a 3.0 star hotel with a 6.91/10 rating.  The flight for this travel package would be from Monday, August 15th at 10:00 a.m. to Sunday, August 21st at 4:00 a.m.  The hotel has free parking and free wifi.  Would you like to book this travel package?
How much would this package be? Could you offer me a cheaper hotel?
The cost of this package is 1644.98 USD.  Would you like to book this travel package?
Could you show me some hotels with lower guest ratings and lower prices?

Here are a couple of options.  The first option is a 3.0 star hotel (the Tropic), with a guest rating of 6.77/10 and a business class flight.  The cost is 1002.27 USD.  Or, if you prefer, you could choose the same 3.0 star hotel with a guest rating of 6.77/10 (the Tropic) and an economy flight,  for 812.69.
What other destinations could you offer me if I'm departing from Birmingham City?
I could offer you Vancouver, British Columbia, or Porto Alegre, Brazil.  Which would you prefer?
How much are the packages to each city?
Would you like a more expensive or a less expensive travel package?
I would like to see both options, along with the hotels offered

I could offer you the package to Porto Alegre, Brazil for 2572.16 USD. The hotel would be the Deluxe Hotel (which has a guest rating of 8.69/10) or the package to Vancouver, British Columbia for 477.93 USD .  The hotel would be Parallel Carnaval Bed & Breakfast (which has a guest rating of 8.86/10).
I can extend my vacation time to the 14th of September, does this open up any new options?

I have an even better option available for you.  You could travel to Vancouver, Canada for $511.80 USD.  You would stay at the Western Ridge.  It is a 4.0 star hotel with a 10/10 guest rating.  If, however, you would really like to travel to Mexico City, I have a great package for you at only 1168.35 USD.  You would stay at the Exalted Willow Resort & Suites.  It is a 3.5 star hotel with a 8.37/10 guest rating.  Which would you prefer?
Could you tell me which of these resorts offers free wifi?
Both have wifi
I am also inquiring about the previous offered packages
All of them do.
Could you let me know which class I would be flying in for each destination?
Would you prefer to fly Business Class or Economy?
I would prefer to fly economy
The flight to Vancouver and the flight to Mexico City are Economy flights.
Then I would like to travel to Vancouver and stay at the Western Ridge
Good afternoon. I'd like to book a business trip to New York from Mannheim. What can you offer?
Certainly. What date do you have business in Mannheim so that I can accommodate your schedule?
Dates are flexible, but I have a company budget of 3100 USD. I'd like to go either in August or September.
Great. I have a 5 star hotel available for 2097.76USD.
how much will it cost?
The above price leaves August 17th and returns August 27th. To leave August 27th and return on September 6th, the price would be 2582.47USD.
What about leaving around September 13th?
You could leave September 16th and return September 26th for 2753.45USD.
I prefer the one leaving on August 17th. Is there free wifi?
The Regal Resort has free wifi as well as a spa to relax at after your business meetings!
That sounds very nice. Does the package include a business class flight?
2097.76USD is the cost for Economy flights. To upgrade to Business class would cost 2674.43USD. Would you like to book this trip with Business class flights?
Yes I would!
Perfect. You will depart from New York at 2:00 pm - Wednesday, August 17th 2016.
What is the time of arrival?
You will arrive in Mannheim at 10:16 pm - Wednesday, August 17th 2016.
Great! And the time at which I will be departing from Mannheim to return to nyc?
You will leave Mannheim at 8:00 am - Saturday, August 27th 2016 and arrive in New York at 4:16 pm - Saturday, August 27th 2016
Excellent. There is a possibility that I may need to bring a co-worker with me. How much would the trip cost for 2 people?
To include a second person on this trip, with both of you flying business class, the cost would be 5348.87USD
I see. In that case I will book this trip only for myself today.
Ok. Have a good day
It was a pleasure! Thank you.
I would like a vacation for one in Mannheim from August 17 to September 7. My city of departure is Porto Alegre. It should cost less than $3000.
I do not have a travel package to Mannheim from Porto Alegre for these travel dates.  I do however, have packages available from August 17th to the 29th.     Would these dates work for you?
How much would this package cost?
I have two options.  The first option is a travel package which costs 2314.59 USD.  The second package costs 2981.83 USD.  Which one would you prefer?
If I increase my budget to $6000, does that open up any options from August 17 to September 7?
I still have only two packages available from August 17th to September 7th.  Would you like to try a different travel destination?
What other destinations can you offer me with these dates?
I have no other destinations available for these dates.  Would you like to change the start date or the end date?
Are there packages for two-week trips within these dates?
I have two possible packages for you.  Atlanta, United States, to Indianapolis, United States or Brasilia, Brazil to Vancouver, Canada.  Which would you prefer?
Are both of the packages to Porto still available if I bring my wife with me?

The only package which would be available would be Atlanta, United States to Vancouver, Canada.  I have two packages available for you: one for  $2182.70, and another for $2326.54.  Would you like me to describe these two packages for you?
Yes, please.

The first travel package is an Economy flight from Atlanta, United States to Vancouver, Canada at 6:00 p.m. on August 11th,  and an Economy flight from Vancouver, Canada to Atlanta, United States at 10:00 a.m on August 14th.  The cost of $2182.70 includes a 4 star hotel with a 8.8/10 rating.
What is the second package

The second travel package is an Economy flight from Atlanta, United States to Vancouver, Canada at 6:00 p.m. on Friday, August 19th, and an Economy flight from Vancouver, Canada to Atlanta, United States at 10:00 a.m. on Monday, August 22nd.  The cost of $2326.54 includes a 4 star hotel with guest rating of 8.8/10.  Would you like to book this travel package?
I would like to book the first package to Vancouver
Hi I am planning on booking a vacation soon, around August 27th
Do you have an idea of where you would like to go?
I was thinking maybe St. Louis
what city will you be departing from? Any other people travelling with you?
I will be departing from Tijuana. I'll be going solo

I have several options available. A good option would be Chateau Inn & Suites which is a nicely located 3-star hotel. Departure on an economy flight would be on August 27th, returning on Sept 5th.  Total cost for this package is $1324.29. It is also available in business class.
what type of packages would i get if i were to go to Mannheim instead?
If you would rather go to Mannheim, I have 6 day packages available at a 5-star hotel called The Regal Resort.
im looking for a longer trip, would there perhaps be one in san antonio?
I have 9 day trips available in San Antonio but the departure dates are all in September. Are you able to go in September instead of August 27th?
yes i could as long as i return by September 17th
I have departures available on September 1st, September 7th and September 8th.  I have two choices in hotels - the Vertex Inn or the Winter Hill Inn., both of which are rated two stars.
What would the duration be? and could I see some better rated hotels?

Availability is from Sept 1st to the 9th, Sept 7 to the 15th and Sept 8th to the 16th.  I do not have any hotels available with a better rating. Please do note that both hotels have free parking,  free breakfast and free wifi. Are you looking for a flight in economy class or business class?
they seem very accommodating, how much would this stay on the 1st be compared a vacation in mannheim at the regal resort?
In economy or business class?
for business class
For business class at the Vertex Inn in San Antonio Sept 7 to Sept 15th, the price is $1477.34.
in contrast to mannheim?

Also in business class in San Antonio, I have the Winter Hill either from Sept 1st to 9th or Sept 8th to the 16th at $1477.00.  Business class to the Regal in Mannheim is $3451.00 if you choose to go Aug 27 to Aug 31st and if you pick the week of Sept 6th to the 10th, it is $4249.00.
I think i would like to book the trip to mannheim, leaving on the 27th
Okay I will get all your information and we will proceed with the booking. We  appreciate your business.
thank you very much
Hi!
To start, just give me some information on where you'd like to travel, your budget, your point of departure, or any other travel info you can think of.
Ok great! I'm looking for a trip from August 19th to September 3rd, and I'm thinking of going to Mexico City. I would be departing from Busan.
I've got some options available for you. Will you be travelling alone?
Yes! For the first time.
Ok! I have 5 days at a 3 star hotel available for 3259.79USD. What do you think?
That sounds nice. What is the name of the hotel?
The hotel is called Sublime Echo.
Does it have a view of the ocean?
I am not sure
Great! Do you know if there is free wifi and breakfast?
There is free parking and free wifi, but no free breakfast.
What are the departure dates?

You would leave Busan at 7:00 am - Wednesday, August 24th and depart from Mexico City at 1:00 am - Saturday, August 27th. I also have a free breakfast hotel available for 4002.28USD which leaves Busan at 7:00 am - Saturday, August 27th.
The second option is how many days?
The second option is also 5 days.
I'll keep the second Mexico City option in mind. I have some other places that I'd like to consider.
Ok! Where would you like to go?
What about Santo Domingo for the same dates?
I can get you a hotel in Santo Domingo for 2446.15USD.
5 days?
9 days actually.
With free breakfast?
Free breakfast, wifi, and parking!
Amazing! This one is already looking better than Mexico City. What are the departure and arrival dates and times?
It is a great deal! You would depart Busan at 11:00 am - Wednesday, August 24th and leave Santo Domingo at 1:00 am - Wednesday, August 31st.
That sounds great to me. I have two other cities that I'd like to consider. Let's start with Toronto. What can you get me for the same dates with free breakfast?
Ok! I can get you 7 days in Toronto for 2732.81USD.
I like the sound of that. What are the departure and arrival dates and times for this one?

9:00 am - Wednesday, August 17th you would leave Busan and arrive in Toronto at  9:04 pm of the same day. Your return trip would depart from Toronto at 1:00 am on Monday, August 22nd and arrive in Busan at 1:04 pm that day.
Excellent. Can you see what's available in Athens?
Would you like to hear only options with free breakfast in Athens?
Yes please!
Unfortunately I have nothing available in Athens with free breakfast within your date range. However, I can get you a hotel with free parking and wifi for 3998.37USD.
Not interested. Let's go back to the Toronto package. How many stars?
For the package priced at 2732.81USD in Toronto the hotel has a 4 star rating.
Does it have a spa?
There is no spa.
I will still book the Toronto package. I can't wait!
Ok! I will book that package for you. Enjoy!
Great thank you so much!
Hi! I'd like to go to Boston from Mos Eisley on August 15th.
Hey there! I'm having trouble finding trips to Mos Eisley for that date. How about a trip to Vancouver instead?
Not Vancouver, anything for Porto Alegre?
Sure! I can book you 14 days in Porto Alegre, but you would leave August 18th. Is this ok?
What about if I leave from Rome instead of Mos Eisley?
I can book you 6 days in Boston for 2390.12USD if you leave from Rome
Is departure on the 15th of August?
Departure is on August 27th for that price.
I need to leave on the 15th of August.
When would you like to return?
I don't have a specific date in mind.
Do you have another departure option?
nope.
Sorry, I have no trips to Boston leaving from those destinations on August 15th.
What about Porto Alegre?
I have a trip to Porto Alegre that leaves from Rome on August 15th. It is 12 days long.
How much is it?
3334.98USD or 3344.57USD depending on the hotel.
I should have mentioned earlier, we are 6 adults.
Oh! In that case, the cost ranges from 20009.92USD to 20067.46USD.
That's way too much! I have a budget of 3700 USD!
Sorry, I cannot offer anything in Porto Alegre for 6 adults at that price.
Ok, thank you for your help, friend.
Hi im from Leon and looking to get away
Do you have a special destination in mind?
Maybe milan
Any specific dates in mind?
august 18th. until september 2nd
For Milan, I have a trip available departing on Aug 19 and returning on the 23rd. For Naples, I have a trip departing on August 19 and returning on August 25th.
what are the hotels like in these two places

In Milan I have the Pink Star Hotel, which is a nice 4-star hotel with breakfast and wifi included. In Naples, I have the Courtyard resort with a 3-star rating and the Tower Hotel, which is a 4-star, both of which also include breakfast and wifi.
what are the price differences for the two 4 star hotels?
will you be flying business class or economy?
let’s say for all packages in respect to business class
For the 4-star Pink Star hotel in Milan, business class flight, 7 day  stay the price is $987.81. For the 4-star Tower Hotel in Naples, a 5 day stay is $838.33
seems like Naples is a little too expensive what packages are there in Hamburg?
In Hamburg, in a 4-star hotel for a 10 day stay flying business class, I have the Traveller Inn at $1069.88 and the Vortex at $1098.63.
i would rather go to milan. i would like to take the package with the 4 stars
So just to confirm, you will go with the Pink Star hotel in Milan from Friday August 16 until the 25th, business class at a price of $987.81, correct?
perfect lets book it. thank you!
I'd like to go to Manaus from Miami between August 19th and September 2nd.
Sure! How many people are in your party?
Myself and two colleagues
Ok! I can book you 7 days in Manas for 5775.3USD. How does that sound?
That's great! What are the dates?
You would leave Miami on Friday, August 19th and return on Wednesday, August 24th.
Excellent! For 3 people?
That's right!
What amenities does the hotel have?
The hotel offers free breakfast, wifi, and parking.
Perfect. I'd like to also compare the prices for a trip to Kobe between the same dates.
Absolutely! The three of you could spend 5 days in Kobe for 1735.50USD.
What are the departure and arrival dates and times?

You would leave for Kobe at 8:00 am on Saturday, August 27th and arrive at 9:21 am  on the same day. Upon return, you would leave for Miami at 3:00 am on Wednesday, August 31st to arrive home that morning at 4:21 am.
Looking good so far. What amenities does this hotel have?
This hotel has free breakfast and free wifi.
And how many stars?
The hotel rating is 3 stars.
What about the hotel in Manas?
The hotel in Manas is 2.5 stars.
The Kobe package is considerably less expensive, I'll go with that one.
Great! I will go ahead and book that for you.
Thank you!
Hi! I'd like to do some vacation shopping!
Sure thing! That's what I'm here for! Where are you located?
I live in Campinas, and I'd like to travel from August 25 the September 7. Let's start by looking at Vancouver!
Great! You could spend 10 days in Vancouver for 3051.29USD.
Is there free breakfast, wifi or parking?
Yes- all three!
How many stars?
The hotel has a 4.0 star rating !
Great! Now what about La Paz?
You can travel to La Paz from Campinas from August 27th to September 2nd.
I would like some details about this one, please. For how much and how many days?
You will spend 8 days in La Paz for 2758.9USD.
What amenities does the hotel have?
This hotel has free wifi, free breakfast, and free parking.
Can we take a look at trips to Kyoto?
Would you like to travel to Kyoto between August 25-30 or September 1-6?
Let's look at August 25 to 30th.
I could also do August 26-31, August 27-Sept 1, or August 30-September 4. Do any of those dates interest you?
Yes actually, I prefer August 27 to September 1.
Ok! There is a 3 star hotel available for 8135.48USD for those dates.
Great! what are the options for August 26 to 31?
I have a different 3 star hotel for those dates at 5218.82USD.
Wow considerably cheaper! Can you tell me about the hotel's amenities?
That hotel has free wifi and free breakfast.
Great! I also want to look at Puebla for the same dates.
I can book August 25-September 5 in Puebla for 2320.70USD.
The Puebla package is the cheapest, I'd like to know more about it. The hotel has how many stars?
Sure thing! The hotel is 4.0 stars.
I really like this package. Is there a spa?
No spa unfortunately. :slightly_frowning_face: Would you like me to look into options in Puebla with a spa?
If you don't mind yes please!
Sorry, there are no options available in Puebla with a spa.
That's ok, let's go back to the 4.0 star hotel. Is there free wifi and breakfast? I won't have a car, so I don't need free parking.
The 4.0 star hotel in Puebla has free wifi and free breakfast!
Great! What's the name of the hotel? I'd like to give them a call.
Absolutely! Los Campeones is the name.
The hotel is great. I will book this one please!
I will go ahead and book that for you.
Thanks!
Hello wozbot!
Hey there! How can I help you?
My husband and I are recently married, we are looking for a honeymoon vacation.
Where were you thinking?
Perhaps Toronto. We are currently in Rome for business, we'd like to leave from here. We're looking at going from August 18 to August 29th.
Ok, great! Are you flexible on those dates by any chance?
Not very. The divorce is planned for August 30th.
I could book you August 24-August 29?
Yes please.
Ok, great! Would you like to know any more information before I book?
Yes of course! Is the hotel 5 stars?
The hotel is 3 stars.
This is a very special time for us. I'd like to see what you have that's 5 stars please.
How about 4 stars from August 17 to August 22?
That is good. Is there a spa?
There is no spa.
How about breakfast and wifi?
Yes - both are included for free!
Great! How much is this package with business class?
The package costs 4446.60USD with business class flights.
That sounds good. My husband loves Vancouver, can we take a look at some packages?
Ok! Would you like to leave from Rome or Toronto?
From Rome please, and I have a preference for a hotel with a spa. If possible.
Hmm.. I'm not seeing any Vancouver options with spas available :disappointed:
Any 5 star hotels?
I've only got 4 star hotels
In that case, how about Columbus?
The only dates I have available in Columbus are August 15-25.
Ok, what about Calgary? My new boyfriend lives there.
I have a 4 star available from August 17-August 21 in Calgary for 2 people.
Great! How much?
Is there a spa?
Sadly there is no spa :disappointed:
Are there any available that do have a spa?
Not in Calgary, sorry about that.
That's ok. My husband would probably prefer the Toronto package. Can you please give me the flight details?
Certainly! Would you like to fly economy or business class?
Business class!

You will leave Rome at 9:00 am on Wednesday, August 17th 2016 to arrive in Toronto at 4:07 pm on Wednesday, August 17th 2016.
Leaving Toronto, you flight departs at 1:00 am on Monday, August 22nd 2016 and arrives in Rome at 8:07 am - Monday, August 22nd 2016.
Perfect, lets go right ahead and book this one
Consider it done!
Thank you wozbot, it was a pleasure dealing with you.
I live in Toronto, can we se what packages are available in Cairo from August 17 to September 7?
I have no flights on those dates going from Toronto to Cairo. Are you able to fly out of Fort Lauderdale, Alexandria or Boston instead? Or can we look at other destinations?
Lets take a look at Pittsburgh as a destination!
You would have to fly out of St. Petersburg or Burlington. Any other destination we could consider? Do you have a budget?
How about Leon?
We have no flights out of Toronto at all. Are you able to leave from another city?
Can you tell me where the nearest city with available flights is?
I am sorry, I have no packages available in Leon.
What about flights to La Paz from Toronto?
Did you have a budget in mind?
Not for this trip, my future child deserves the very best!
Regrettably, the only packages available for La Paz are out of Tijuana or Puebla.
I have business in Calgary around those dates, what say I leave from Calgary, could I get a trip somewhere?

As a matter of fact, I have the Echo, which is a nice 4 star property available in La Paz from August 19th to August 24th, with a direct flight from Calgary. Is this something that could work for you?
